info.title: Otreeba Open Cannabis API
info.description: This is an open, canonical database of cannabis seed companies, strains, brands, products, retailers, and studies from [Otreeba](https://otreeba.com). It is written on the OpenAPI Specification AKA Swagger. You can find out more about the Open API Initiative at [https://www.openapis.org/](https://www.openapis.org), or more info on Swagger at [http://swagger.io/](http://swagger.io/).

get.summary: Get a list of all current seed companies.
get.description: Returns a paginated list of seed companies.
get.summary: getSeedCompanies

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Default 10. Max 50.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: How to sort the items.

data.description: Gets the current list of Seed Comapnies.

meta.description: Gets the current list of Seed Comapnies.

get.summary: Find seed company by Open Cannabis Product Code (OCPC).
get.description: Returns a single seed company.
get.summary: getSeedCompanyByOcpc

parameters.name: ocpc
parameters.description: OCPC of the seed company to return.

get.summary: Find strains for a seed company by Open Cannabis Product Code (OCPC).
get.description: Returns a paginated list of strains for a single seed company.
get.summary: getSeedCompanyStrainsByOcpc

parameters.name: ocpc
parameters.description: OCPC of the seed company to return strains for.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Default 10. Max 50.

data.description: Gets the Strains for a Seed Company listing from a given OCPC.

meta.description: Gets the Strains for a Seed Company listing from a given OCPC.

pagination.description: Gets the Strains for a Seed Company listing from a given OCPC.

ocpc.description: Open Cannabis Product Code for the brand.

qr.description: URL for QR that leads to page on Cannabis Reports.

url.description: URL for brand on Cannabis Reports.

flowers.description: OCPCs of the flowers from this brand.

extracts.description: OCPCs of the extracts from this brand.

edibles.description: OCPCs of the edibles from this brand.

products.description: OCPCs of the products from this brand.

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

slug.description: Slug based on the condition name.

description.example: Fibromyalgia, an illness characterized by chronic pain combined with some form of psychiatric diagnosis, still lacks an observable underlying pathology. The disease picture of fibromyalgia usually includes widespread chronic pains in muscles and connective tissue, joint stiffness, general weakness, exhaustion, depression, anxiety, and insomnia. “Nearly 2 percent of the general population in the United States suffers from fibromyalgia, the majority of them being middle-aged females.”

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

ocpc.description: Open Cannabis Product Code for the edible.

brand.description: Name and Open Cannabis Product Code of the brand that created this edible.

strain.description: Name and Open Cannabis Product Code of the strain for this edible.

qr.description: URL for QR that leads to page on Cannabis Reports.

url.description: URL for the edible on Cannabis Reports.

image.description: URL for the main photo of the edible.

labTest.description: URL for the PDF containing lab testing information for this edible.

hashOil.description: Hash oil measurement for this edible.

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

ocpc.description: Open Cannabis Product Code for the seed company.

qr.description: URL for QR that leads to page on Cannabis Reports.

url.description: URL for seed company on Cannabis Reports.

image.description: URL for logo for seed company.

lineage.description: Object of countries that this seed company has lineages from. {'Country Name' => 'ISO 3166-1 Two Letter Country Code'}

strains.description: OCPCs of the strains from this seed company.

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

ocpc.description: Open Cannabis Product Code for the strain.

seedCompany.description: Name and Open Cannabis Product Code of the seed company that created the strain.

qr.description: URL for QR that leads to page on Cannabis Reports.

url.description: URL for strain on Cannabis Reports.

image.description: URL for the main photo of the strain.

lineage.description: Object of countries that this strain has lineages from. {'Country Name' => 'ISO 3166-1 Two Letter Country Code'}

genetics.description: Names of the parents of the strains and their associated Open Cannabis Product Codes.

children.description: Open Cannabis Product Codes of the children of this strain.

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

name.example: Trans- β -Caryophyllene: An Effective Antileishmanial Compound Found in Commercial Copaiba Oil (Copaifera spp.).

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier for the study.

slug.description: Slug based on the study name.

keyFindings.example: This study pointed out β -caryophyllene as an effective antileishmanial compound.

createdAt.description: Date and time record was created, UTC.

updatedAt.description: Date and time record was updated, UTC.

tags.name: Brands
tags.description: Companies that create or distribute various forms of flowers, extracts, edibles, or products.

tags.name: Flowers
tags.description: Finished cannabis seeds, clones, flowers, or shake.

tags.name: Extracts
tags.description: Extracted or concentrated forms of cannabis.

tags.name: Edibles
tags.description: Consumable products infused with cannabis extracts or flowers.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Products not meant for consumption infused with cannabis extracts or flowers.

tags.name: Studies
tags.description: Studies on cannabis for different medical conditions.
